metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6118 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A double-eviction in the Incognito mode cache that lead to auser-after-free in cache in Google Chrome prior to 66.0.3359.139 allowed aremote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to executearbitrary code via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
